one.label: 1. Using MetaMask
one.paragraph:
a) Install MetaMask and
b) Create an Ethereum Address

two.label: 2. Using Mist
two.paragraph:
a) Install and run Mist and
b) Create an Ethereum Address

fund.title: 02. Fund Wallet
fund.subtitle: Fund your Ethereum Address with some Ether

one.label: 1. Using other crypto currencies
one.paragraph:
Use for example:
a) Coinbase or
b) ShapeShift to
Convert your crypto currencies into Ether.

two.label: 2. Using fiat currencies
two.paragraph:
a) For non-technical people it is recommeneded to use BitcoinSuisse
which can allocate your fiat currencies to Melon on your behalf.
b) Or use a centralized exchange to convert your fiat currencies into Ether

contribute.title: 03. Contribute
contribute.subtitle: Contribute to the future of finance

one.label: 1. Visit our decentralised application
one.paragraph:
a) Use MetaMask together with Chrome or
b) Use Mist to
Browse to https://contribution.melonport.com/

two.label: 2. Send Ether and become a part of Melon
two.paragraph: Use our decentralised application to send Ether to Melon
